sn9.1:4.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ aññataro bhikkhu kosalesu viharati aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe.
sn9.1:4.3: Tena kho pana samayena so bhikkhu divāvihāragato pāpake akusale vitakke vitakketi gehanissite.
sn9.1:4.4: Atha kho yā tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā tassa bhikkhuno anukampikā atthakāmā taṃ bhikkhuṃ saṃvejetukāmā yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami;
sn9.1:7.1: Sakuṇo yathā paṃsukunthito,
sn9.1:8.1: Atha kho so bhikkhu tāya devatāya saṃvejito saṃvegamāpādīti.
